name: @ondewo/ondewo-nlu-client-js
description: ONDEWO Natural Language Understanding (NLU) Client library for Js
author: ONDEWO GmbH <office@ondewo.com>

scripts.build: docker run -it -v ${PWD}:/input-volume -v ${PWD}/../api:/output-volume ondewo-js-proto-compiler ondewo-nlu-api ondewo-nlu-api ondewo
scripts.build-update: npm run build-only && npm run start-example
scripts.start-example: sudo cp lib/nlu.js example/lib/nlu.js && http-server example
scripts.build-sample: docker run -it -v ${PWD}/src:/input-volume -v ${PWD}/src/../api:/output-volume $npm_package_config_compiler nlu ondewo-nlu-api ondewo-nlu-api ondewo
